JobFullDesc:
What's next in music happens on SoundCloud first. As the world’s largest open audio platform, SoundCloud is powered by a connected community of creators, listeners and curators who share, discover and influence what's new, now and next in music and audio. We reach hundreds of millions of listeners globally every month, many of whom listen on mobile. We are now looking for a Mobile engineer to join our engineering team in Berlin.
If you are passionate about mobile platforms, loving to translate code into user-friendly apps and want to become a cross platform mobile developer, we would like to meet you. 
As an Engineer you know how to create clean code, review, test, debug and document it. You also have a very good understanding of Object Oriented Design Patterns.  
As a Mobile Engineer, 

You have extensive knowledge about mobile app development, from the first line of code to publishing in the store(s). 
Solid experience of at least one mobile platform (Google’s Android or Apple’s iOS) and some knowledge about the other one. Proficiency therefore, in at least one programming language out of Kotlin, Android Java, Swift and/or Objective-C
Proficiency with writing automated tests (.eg. JUnit, Espresso, Mocha, Jest, Enzyme, XCTest, etc.)
In-depth knowledge in building adaptive UIs for phones and tablets
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
Knowledge of cross-platform development options, such as Web views, React Native, Kotlin Native etc would be benefitial.

We're currently hiring for multiple teams with different missions, technologies and challenges; and we will discuss potential teams with you to figure out the best fit together.
 About Us:


We’re international! We operate in the US, Berlin and London and all of our communication is in English. 


We have a flexible, friendly and inclusive office environment in Mitte 


Our environment is a learning one, with specific focus on development, including a professional development allowance and a possibility to use 20% of your time for a personal project.


You can contribute to our Engineering Blog post. 


Not located in Berlin? No worries, we offer extensive relocation support including allowances, one way flights, temporary accommodation and, by partnering with Expath, on the ground support on arrival.


Interested in a gym membership, photography course or book? We have a Creativity and wellness benefit!


We offer free German courses at beginning, intermediate and advanced. 


Diversity at SoundCloud:
SoundCloud is for everyone. Diversity and open expression are fundamental to our organization; they help us build a social platform and global community where anyone can create, discover and share sounds. We acknowledge the challenges in our industry, and strive to develop an inclusive culture where everyone can contribute.
